title: keseoma
author: keseoma
content: BREAKING: CCTV (CHINA CENTRAL TELEVISION) FEATURED #SAMO memecoin (@ samoyedcoin )’S QR CODE THAT LINKS TO ITS WEBSITE!It's the SAMO on Solana! Has been 6X in 30 minutes!And now it's midnight in China, the news been spread on twitter and telegram groups.It will be 100X when people wake up ~~~Trust the power of those Chinese buyers， they will be crazy tomorrow morning !

comments.author: terciduk123
comments.body: Yes, SAMO was pumped at the time, but now it's back down, an increase of up to 100x for SAMO still seems like a distant hope.

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: Another hyped meme token, be careful with these Chinese market as they are also known for manipulating the market especially this is a meme token that we are talking about. Don’t ever chase a project, if its too late to buy then so be it because you might got trap and you might not be able to sell it at profit anymore. 100x might not happen this year, as it is still down from its ATH, and its current price is down again.

comments.author: irsykes
comments.body: Quote from: goaldigger on May 27, 2023, 09:29:20 PMAnother hyped meme token, be careful with these Chinese market as they are also known for manipulating the market especially this is a meme token that we are talking about. Don’t ever chase a project, if its too late to buy then so be it because you might got trap and you might not be able to sell it at profit anymore. 100x might not happen this year, as it is still down from its ATH, and its current price is down again. China's manipulation strategy is not arbitrary, it is appropriate that the country is called extraordinary, on the other hand China is the largest bitcoin holder after America. don't get carried away easily by FUD news, just understand what meme project will have a long future obscure concept it's too rare to survive. altcoins apart from meme coins which are definitely a lot to hold on to for the long term.

comments.author: poodle63
comments.body: The stupidest token to be bought just caused by a gimmick news. Samo dumped back again to the bottom man. Anyone who has been buying this stupid token during the pump already lost a lot on their assets. it's not even worthy to be owned for the long term hold. The drastic pump was just happening a few hours and it will back to the bottom again.

comments.author: lunnatic
comments.body: I think this is FOMO, you can see that the price of SAMO has fallen again to $ 0.0045 and has fallen deeply since yesterday. I don't think about buying SAMO because SAMO is on the Solana network and SAMO is also part of memecoin, so it is very risky to be forced to buy.

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: Quote from: goaldigger on May 27, 2023, 09:29:20 PMAnother hyped meme token, be careful with these Chinese market as they are also known for manipulating the market especially this is a meme token that we are talking about. Don’t ever chase a project, if its too late to buy then so be it because you might got trap and you might not be able to sell it at profit anymore. 100x might not happen this year, as it is still down from its ATH, and its current price is down again. Any meme token with an unfamiliar trace to the information on it background developers is a risk and nothing more, they are fast increasing the numbers of tokens being introduced and many people believed that they can quickly seize an advantage in making a quick time profit on them within just a short period of time, the truth is that the developers matters here, if they are not of higher standard of reputation it will only end in waste of money because many have been scammed through these same procedures after which the developers were found hyping their scam token.

comments.author: Iyeman
comments.body: FOMO is real. There are so many people losing their money caused by they trapped into the short term pump by the whales. SAMO has become crazy meme coin in the past but it's now useless coin. I don't even know the main reason for people to buy at peak price. It goes down like a meteor that was going to the earth. This shit scam coin will die again for second time.

comments.author: AbuBhakar
comments.body: Quote from: Iyeman on May 29, 2023, 04:05:09 PMFOMO is real. There are so many people losing their money caused by they trapped into the short term pump by the whales. SAMO has become crazy meme coin in the past but it's now useless coin. I don't even know the main reason for people to buy at peak price. It goes down like a meteor that was going to the earth. This shit scam coin will die again for second time. Simply because of the hype and no sign of holding back during the token is being hype. FOMO is very powerful the subject token have a very bullish signal in a form of big news event. People think the price will not go down when the hype is still very strong that’s why many newbie traders are being left out by whales that use their money as an exit liquidity from this money making shitcoin.Buying this very token is what I really done understand. This coin is pure garbage and feeding on the hype. Meme coins use any possible news to convert it for a bullish news. It's better to place your money as bet on gambling rather than a shitcoin without a future.

comments.author: nimogsm
comments.body: another significant case when the next token is promoted in this way. Show two seconds on TV and make a sensation out of it. This only once again proves that one should stay away from such projects, because without subsequent PR, nothing good can be expected in the long term.

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: Quote from: nimogsm on May 29, 2023, 05:14:45 PManother significant case when the next token is promoted in this way. Show two seconds on TV and make a sensation out of it. This only once again proves that one should stay away from such projects, because without subsequent PR, nothing good can be expected in the long term.This is a welcome idea and i believe some will take it and accept with all seriousness, it's always got many being excited on seing a new coin of ICO coming onboard but they don't take their time to research on them well, also the project developers don't also sit to think well before launching their coin because they are too eager to make traffic and money, it's what should be established for long, let's no rush on doing the normal procedures and remain calm to follow the required standard and this applies to the investors and developers.
